category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_validate_object_and_upload_to_imds_workflow
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the workflow to instantiate when an International Material Data System (IMDS) object data requires custom validation by custom handler before sending to the International Material Data System (IMDS). The default value is "IMDS - Validate Object and upload to IMDS".

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: IMDS - Validate Object and upload to IMDS
